Ice::

She had been laying the snow, sleeping for some time. She was covered 
in new fallen snow. She lifted her head up and loked around. She saw 
that the landscape was totally white. She smiled and stood up. HEr 
shoulder was throbbing and still trickling blood. She looked down at 
where she was laying and saw a frozen puddle of red liquid in the 
snow. She shook off the rest of the snow off her body and started 
walking again. She headed north and just wakled along, in a calm 
manner, seeing what there was to see. She left a small trickle of 
blood in the snow as she walked, but would soon be coverd by the 
falling snow.
